Group 2 ( tractographic ) : Magnetic resonance ( MR ) -tractography guide DBS implantation dentato-rubro-thalamic bundle ( DRT ) general anesthesia At baseline/neurosurgery visit Quality Life ( QoL ) parameter assess .
